message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  It's a good deal considering the inflation.
You got aggressive, I'll take a bit more, but still fair considering the inflation.
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not giving up the majority.  Let's meet in the middle.  You get 40%, I get 60%.
You're still being too greedy. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but you need to meet me in the middle.
